```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
m <- 6.39e23
r <- 3.39e6
G <- 6.67e-11

ans <- sqrt(2 * G * m / r) / 1000 # km/s
dis <- c(sqrt(G * m / r)) / 1000

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, wrong = dis, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%.2f km/s", sc$questions)
```
Question
========
What is the escape speed on Mars? The mass of Mars is $6.39 \times 10^{23}$ kg and
its radius is $3.39 \times 10^6$ m.

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The escape speed is
$$v_{esc} = \sqrt{\frac{2GM}{r}} = `r signif(ans,3)` \text{ km/s}$$
